name: angular-app-server
description: Back end server to support our angular app

scripts.test: npm run setup; npm run compile; node ./node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt; node ./node_modules/compy/bin/compy -d client -o webapp test
scripts.setup: cd tests/socketClientPatched && npm install && cd ../../client && npm install && cd .. && node ./node_modules/compy/bin/compy -d client install && node ./node_modules/compy/bin/compy -d mobile install
scripts.watch: node ./node_modules/compy/bin/compy -d client -o webapp -s server.js server watch
scripts.build-app: node ./node_modules/compy/bin/compy -d client -o webapp compile;node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt buildapp;
scripts.package: node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt packageMac;node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt compress:win; node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt compress:linux;
